member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Search.Configuration.SearchValidationElement.#ctor(Telerik.Sitefinity.Configuration.ConfigElement)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: ConfigElementCollection generally needs to have a parent, however, sometimes it is necessary to create a collection in memory only which is then used later on in the context of a parent. Therefore, is the element is of ConfigElementCollection, exception for a non existing parent will not be thrown.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Search.Publishing.SearchIndexOutboundPipe.IncludeScheduledItems(System.Collections.Generic.ISet{Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Search.Data.IDocument},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Search.Data.IDocument})
member.summary: Matches documents, which are about to be indexed synchronously, with scheduled documents. If there is overlap, then the scheduled documents will be included for immediate processing. We need this in order to make sure that indexing is not reordered due to mixing of synchronous and asynchronous operations.
member.param: Documents that are about to be immediately added to the index.
Documents that are about to be immediately removed from the index.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Search.Web.UI.Public.SearchResults.UrlEvaluationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL evaluation mode - URL segments or query string. This property is used by all controls on a page that have URL Evaluators. Information for interpreting a url for a specific item or page is passed either through the URL itself or through the QueryString. The value of this property indicates which one is used.
